name: What tools do I need
description: Long handled: Fry Lift, Tongs, Fork, & Grill Brush. Metal kebab skewars (wood skewars need to be soaked to prevent them burning) and corn on the cob holders, a heatproof glove, comedy apron and you are good to go!

name: How do I Light my charcoal
description: Stack your charcoal into a pyramid, put some firelighters throughout the stack and light.

name: When is it ready to start cooking
description: Once the coals turn white (approx 30-40 minutes) spread evenly and it's ready to use!

name: Is there a food cooking order
description: In short No! However some things will keep better on a warming tray than others (e.g. Chicken will dry out where sausages won't)

name: Is there an absolute barbecue essential
